body: all I want is to see Kaname doing anal

@WEL About the MC being the cuck, that's not the case here and lot of people don't understand that. The MC of this story is Kaname, not her BF, we barely see her BF and even when he shows up we don't see his POV, it's always Kaname's POV. And it's like this for a lot of other NTR stories, a lot of them just focus on the woman and her feelings, so SHE is the MC, not the BF/Husband who barely shows up.
I really like Kaname's char design. . .

If you want Ntr with conflict or revenge then stop reading Japanese stuff because there's never any. Mc is a cuck and remains a a cuck till the very end. Korean Manhwas with Ntr story lines on the other hand are a bit more elaborate and many have developments with MC's that go from total cucks to chads and everyone get what they deserve. On Japanese mangas/doujins this is like 1 in a million chance.
idk how people doesnt get it...
NTR is a product targeted to cuckoldery audience with their various metaphormosis phases of Sadomasochism.

@Haise01 I don't really have a problem with NTR. Hell it used to be my drug of choice.  This particular story just rubbed me the wrong way though. I just REALLY hate Ochiai, and I want something bad to happen to him. Hell I'd even take him actually falling for Kaname and getting cucked himself. That'd be a nice twist.

I don't really understand the people that read NTR and just wants to see the cuck find out and get revenge, what is your fetish? Is it a revenge fetish or something?
Like most comments are just ''Oh I hope this series just end'' or ''I hope her bf finds out and get revenge''
Oh man, I love Kaname but this one was boring...
I haven't seen an ntr from this author than ended good. Meaning the guy didn't just become a crying brain dead simp. It just looks like its going end in an orgy excluding boyfriend.
Finally...but this chapter boring ...make more chapter this they fucked

@TvManga2020 Assuming volume 2 is following the same pattern as 1, things should flip by the end of next chapter. I'm hoping Shiori finds out, and that lights the fuse for some good drama. It was kind of alluded to that Shiori would be the one to find out about them in 9.5 (assuming that chapter even happened). This story ain't gonna end well, but I really, REALLY hope Tooru decks Ochiai in his smug, cunt face. Probably too much to hope for, I know, but the thought of it is comforting

This girl has plot armor, her family rich, mother pretty much training her there no such thing as love just lust, to just enjoy the dick and move on. Sad thing is i invested in this so now we see what happens

@gimmick92 I agree, this chapter is no point of it I thought that her boyfriend would find the truth that she’s cheating with his best friend hopefully next chapter that need to happen. I want to see some serious conflict and pay back

To be honest the second book doesn't feel at all necessary. It's only short one chapter stories when she goes further and further into cheating the guy. He could've ended the story at the end of the first book, chapter 9 I believe. The characters have lost all personality at this point... Not that the story was good to begin with, just saying.
